name: Tetris Pro (Illusion Software)
overview: This version of Tetris Pro for the Amiga was created by Robert Ciesnik of Illusion Soft. It has additional features and rules including bombs that will fill holes in an area, $ pieces that give additional points, D deletes a line, plus or minus to change speed of play and so forth. A picture of the author is displayed behind areas cleared out, there are multiple images in the game pack shown on other levels including some that are adult in nature.
